devdoc.details: Import this contract in different smart contracts which will share the same data model.

NewGateKeeper(address,address).details: Emitted when new gateKeepr setup by `owner`.

ReceivedETH(uint256,uint256,address).details: Emitted every time ETH staked in an account.

constructor.details: Setup `gatekeeer` and `oracleFacade` . Create an `Escrow` contract to hold ETH of actors

getEscrow().details: retrieve the address of the escrow contract

getGateKeeper().details: retrieve the address of the gateKeeper contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setGateKeeper(address).details: Allow to change dynamically access control contract (GateKeeper)

params._gateKeeper: gateKeeper address Requirements: - only owner can change the reference of GateKeeper - ensure that it impelments the right interface

switchContractOff().details: If the contract is active then stop it and emit a {ContractOff} event. Requirements: - the caller must be root admin.

switchContractOn().details: If the contract is stopped then active it and emit a {ContractOn} event. Requirements: - the caller must be root admin.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Withdraw accumulated balance for a payee Requirements: - msg.sender must have enough balance in the escrow

escrow.details: used for escrow to deposit/withdraw ETH

devdoc.title: common data model and functionalities to be shared.

setGateKeeper(address).notice: call nonReentrant to check against Reentrancy

withdraw().notice: call nonReentrant to check against Reentrancy
